0.author: derz-ed
0.content:
This site is a blog, it's probably gonna be about some coding / data-mining or other random stuff I'm interested in.
If you really like the style of this blog, you can get it on [github](//github.com/Eds-trash-can/a-blog).
Most stuff is directly inspired by [unknown6656](//unknown6656.com) blog.

### Some general information on how to use this site:
* you can comment bellow posts in the "your comment" textarea
* you can rate an article by clicking either the green/red on an /posts site not on / or /search
* you can adjust the theme in the [cookie settings](//blog.derzombiiie.com/static/keks.html) also available the footer

Also please excuse any bad English as I'm not a native speaker.

This post was first posted: 18:20 - 25.08.2021
0.desc: very small description of what i think this blog is about.
